item.title: DYCOM INDUSTRIES INC 10-K
item.description: DYCOM INDUSTRIES INC, which is in the Water, Sewer, Pipeline, Comm And Power Line Construction [1623] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 04, 2022 had 32409 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 412 instances 2021 - 333 instances million - 306 instances january - 295 instances 2022 - 291 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
